title: ON THIS DAY, O BEAUTIFUL MOTHER

sections.title: Verse 1
content: On this day we ask to share,
Aid us ere our feet astray,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Queen of angels deign to hear,
Young hearts gain, O Virgin pure,

sections.title: Chorus
content: On this day, O beautiful Mother,
On this day we give thee our love.
Near thee, Madonna, fondly we hover,
Trusting thy gentle care to prove.
Near thee, Madonna, fondly we hover,
Trusting thy gentle care to prove.
